text: @DrDenaGrayson Your thoughts? Per FL Today on FB: On Fri, 4/10, Parrish Medical Center announced it has been treating coronavirus patients w/ hydroxychloroquine & azithromycin since the start of the pandemic, for patients whose medical history allows the treatment. https://t.co/or7Mp2yvbR
